name: Power Rooting
description:
This game was created during the Global Game Jam 2023 in Dundee Scotland at the Jam Site. After the jam we decided to add more polish to the game.

We are still in the polishing phase so, this game is not finished yet, but already enjoyable.

Here a link the official jam entry:
https://globalgamejam.org/2023/jam-sites/dundee-ggj23

Credits

Nicole Tietze | Illustration / Environment Animation
Stephan Schueritz | Programming
Paul Wulf | Game Design / Programming
Hür Palo | Character Animation
Orion | Audio Recording
